title: Wizard Laboratory
data:
***Version [0.29](/0.29 "0.29")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | In ages past, the most powerful mages — many of whom you may have heard of — would frequently find or construct small realms sealed off from the rest of the world, where they could isolate themselves in the pursuit of ever-greater magical knowledge and power. The mages are long gone, but many of their arcane laboratories still exist, filled with the results of their experiments. Those willing to explore these laboratories may find powerful magical treasure, but be warned: the wizards to whom these labs belonged to deserved their reputations. |

**Wizard Laboratories** (or **Wizlabs**) are a collection of different [portal](/Portal "Portal") levels, most of which are themed around and named after a particular wizard mentioned elsewhere in the game. Each contains a significant amount of loot, as well as unique challenges and enemies found nowhere else in the game. Only one wizard laboratory can generate per game, and not all games are guaranteed to have one.

Wizlabs can be found in timed portals around [the Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths"), [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults"), [the Crypt](/The_Crypt "The Crypt"), and [the Elven Halls](/The_Elven_Halls "The Elven Halls").

### List of Wizard Laboratories

- [![Wizard.png](/images/c/c7/Wizard.png)](/File:Wizard.png) **[Alistair's Party Mansion](/Alistair%27s_Party_Mansion "Alistair's Party Mansion")** - The party of the century, featuring many a wizard.
- [![Halazid warlock.png](/images/d/d2/Halazid_warlock.png)](/File:Halazid_warlock.png) **[Borgnjor's Mausoleum](/Borgnjor%27s_Mausoleum "Borgnjor's Mausoleum")** - A cemetery filled with the undead, who rise as [lost souls](/Lost_soul "Lost soul") when killed.
- [![Cigotuvis monster.png](/images/4/44/Cigotuvis_monster.png)](/File:Cigotuvis_monster.png) **[Cigotuvi's Fleshworks](/Cigotuvi%27s_Fleshworks "Cigotuvi's Fleshworks")** - Twisting halls full of the results of twisted experiments. Only the fortunate will escape with their genes unscathed.
- [![Cloud Mage.png](/images/2/2a/Cloud_Mage.png)](/File:Cloud_Mage.png) **[Cloud Mages' Chambers](/Cloud_Mages%27_Chambers "Cloud Mages' Chambers")** - Halls full of clouds and creatures of the winds. At the end waits a master [Air Mage](/Air_Magic "Air Magic").
- [![Royal mummy.png](/images/6/6e/Royal_mummy.png)](/File:Royal_mummy.png) **[Doroklohe's Tomb](/Doroklohe%27s_Tomb "Doroklohe's Tomb")** - Many powerful entities lie quietly entombed here, but their tombs will not stay closed for long...
- [![Vine-covered golem.png](/images/8/80/Vine-covered_golem.png)](/File:Vine-covered_golem.png) **[Eringya's Formal Garden](/Eringya%27s_Formal_Garden "Eringya's Formal Garden")** - A plant haven, filled with ranged monsters tending to the garden.
- [![Hellbinder.png](/images/0/08/Hellbinder.png)](/File:Hellbinder.png) **[Hall of the Hellbinder](/Hall_of_the_Hellbinder "Hall of the Hellbinder")** - An evil temple filled with [demons](/Demon "Demon") and the cultists that traffic with them.
- [![Conjurer statue.png](/images/f/f5/Conjurer_statue.png)](/File:Conjurer_statue.png) **[Iskenderun's Mystic Tower](/Iskenderun%27s_Mystic_Tower "Iskenderun's Mystic Tower")** - Chock full of students of Iskenderun, all of whom are happy to practice their [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") on intruders.
- [![Moon troll.png](/images/8/88/Moon_troll.png)](/File:Moon_troll.png) **[Lehudib's Moon Base](/Lehudib%27s_Moon_Base "Lehudib's Moon Base")** - A stronghold full of astral horrors, creatures of metal and stone, and the legendary Moon Troll.
- [![Iron golem.png](/images/e/ed/Iron_golem.png)](/File:Iron_golem.png) **[Maxwell's Workshop](/Maxwell%27s_Workshop "Maxwell's Workshop")** - Filled with big, meaty workers who wield big, meaty maces -- and many of Maxwell's [dusty](/Maxwell%27s_patent_armour "Maxwell's patent armour") [inventions](/Maxwell%27s_Thermic_Engine "Maxwell's Thermic Engine"),
- [![Eldritch tentacle.png](/images/5/50/Eldritch_tentacle.png)](/File:Eldritch_tentacle.png) **[Roulette of Golubria](/Roulette_of_Golubria "Roulette of Golubria")** - An extradimensional series of rooms linked by teleporters and filled with denizens of the [Abyss](/Abyss "Abyss").
- [![Tukima's machine.png](/images/d/d8/Tukima%27s_machine.png)](/File:Tukima%27s_machine.png) **[Tukima's Studio](/Tukima%27s_Studio "Tukima's Studio")** - A danceroom filled with dancing weapons, walking tomes, and... you?
- [![Wucad mu statue.png](/images/4/41/Wucad_mu_statue.png)](/File:Wucad_mu_statue.png) **[Wucad Mu's Monastery](/Wucad_Mu%27s_Monastery "Wucad Mu's Monastery")** - A timeless monastery patrolled by the shades of monks from ages past. The [orange crystal statue](/Orange_crystal_statue "Orange crystal statue") in the center is the source of these apparitions.
- [![Head Instructor.png](/images/b/be/Head_Instructor.png)](/File:Head_Instructor.png) **[Yara's Duelist Academy](/Yara%27s_Duelist_Academy "Yara's Duelist Academy")**- Featuring many students training in both magic and [antimagic](/Antimagic "Antimagic"), as well as the [Head Instructor](/Head_Instructor "Head Instructor") - a master wielding two antimagic [triple swords](/Triple_sword "Triple sword").
- [![Zonguldrok lich.png](/images/f/f1/Zonguldrok_lich.png)](/File:Zonguldrok_lich.png) **[Zonguldrok's Shrine](/Zonguldrok%27s_Shrine "Zonguldrok's Shrine")** - A shrine guarded by the [unquiet dead](/Zombie "Zombie") and [skeletal warriors](/Skeletal_warrior "Skeletal warrior"). Zonguldrok himself will rise as a mighty [lich](/Lich "Lich") to punish grave robbers.

## History

- In [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), [Tukima's Studio](/Tukima%27s_Studio "Tukima's Studio") and [Eringya's Formal Garden](/Eringya%27s_Formal_Garden "Eringya's Formal Garden") were re-introduced, and 4 new wizlabs were added: [Yara's Duelist Academy](/Yara%27s_Duelist_Academy "Yara's Duelist Academy"), [Borgnjor's Mausoleum](/Borgnjor%27s_Mausoleum "Borgnjor's Mausoleum"), [Maxwell's Workshop](/Maxwell%27s_Workshop "Maxwell's Workshop"), and [Alistair's Party Mansion](/Alistair%27s_Party_Mansion "Alistair's Party Mansion").
- In [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), [Lehudib's Moon Base](/Lehudib%27s_Moon_Base "Lehudib's Moon Base") was added, while Tukima's Studio and Eringya's Formal Garden were removed.

|            | Temporary [Portals](/Portals "Portals")                                                                                                                      |
| ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Early Game | [Ossuary](/Ossuary "Ossuary") • [Sewers](/Sewers "Sewers")                                                                                                   |
| Mid Game   | [Bailey](/Bailey "Bailey") • [Gauntlet](/Gauntlet "Gauntlet") • [Ice cave](/Ice_cave "Ice cave") • [Volcano](/Volcano "Volcano")                             |
| Late Game  | [Desolation of Salt](/Desolation_of_Salt "Desolation of Salt") • [Wizard Laboratory]() • [Ziggurat](/Ziggurat "Ziggurat") ([Mega-Zig](/Mega-Zig "Mega-Zig")) |
| Peaceful   | [Bazaar](/Bazaar "Bazaar") • [Treasure trove](/Treasure_trove "Treasure trove")                                                                              |
html:
Wizard Laboratory

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.29: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
In ages past, the most powerful mages — many of whom you may have heard of — would frequently find or construct small realms sealed off from the rest of the world, where they could isolate themselves in the pursuit of ever-greater magical knowledge and power. The mages are long gone, but many of their arcane laboratories still exist, filled with the results of their experiments. Those willing to explore these laboratories may find powerful magical treasure, but be warned: the wizards to whom these labs belonged to deserved their reputations.

Wizard Laboratories (or Wizlabs) are a collection of different portal levels, most of which are themed around and named after a particular wizard mentioned elsewhere in the game. Each contains a significant amount of loot, as well as unique challenges and enemies found nowhere else in the game. Only one wizard laboratory can generate per game, and not all games are guaranteed to have one.

Wizlabs can be found in timed portals around the Depths, the Vaults, the Crypt, and the Elven Halls.

List of Wizard Laboratories

  • Alistair's Party Mansion - The party of the century, featuring many a wizard.
  • Borgnjor's Mausoleum - A cemetery filled with the undead, who rise as lost souls when killed.
  • Cigotuvi's Fleshworks - Twisting halls full of the results of twisted experiments. Only the fortunate will escape with their genes unscathed.
  • Cloud Mages' Chambers - Halls full of clouds and creatures of the winds. At the end waits a master Air Mage.
  • Doroklohe's Tomb - Many powerful entities lie quietly entombed here, but their tombs will not stay closed for long...
  • Eringya's Formal Garden - A plant haven, filled with ranged monsters tending to the garden.
  • Hall of the Hellbinder - An evil temple filled with demons and the cultists that traffic with them.
  • Iskenderun's Mystic Tower - Chock full of students of Iskenderun, all of whom are happy to practice their Conjurations on intruders.
  • Lehudib's Moon Base - A stronghold full of astral horrors, creatures of metal and stone, and the legendary Moon Troll.
  • Maxwell's Workshop - Filled with big, meaty workers who wield big, meaty maces -- and many of Maxwell's dusty inventions,
  • Roulette of Golubria - An extradimensional series of rooms linked by teleporters and filled with denizens of the Abyss.
  • Tukima's Studio - A danceroom filled with dancing weapons, walking tomes, and... you?
  • Wucad Mu's Monastery - A timeless monastery patrolled by the shades of monks from ages past. The orange crystal statue in the center is the source of these apparitions.
  • Yara's Duelist Academy- Featuring many students training in both magic and antimagic, as well as the Head Instructor - a master wielding two antimagic triple swords.
  • Zonguldrok's Shrine - A shrine guarded by the unquiet dead and skeletal warriors. Zonguldrok himself will rise as a mighty lich to punish grave robbers.

History

  • In 0.28, Tukima's Studio and Eringya's Formal Garden were re-introduced, and 4 new wizlabs were added: Yara's Duelist Academy, Borgnjor's Mausoleum, Maxwell's Workshop, and Alistair's Party Mansion.
  • In 0.17, Lehudib's Moon Base was added, while Tukima's Studio and Eringya's Formal Garden were removed.
Temporary Portals
Early Game Ossuary • Sewers
Mid Game Bailey • Gauntlet • Ice cave • Volcano
Late Game Desolation of Salt • Wizard Laboratory • Ziggurat (Mega-Zig)
Peaceful Bazaar • Treasure trove
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Wizard_Laboratory&oldid=74186"

{{version029}}
{{flavour|In ages past, the most powerful mages — many of whom you may have heard of — would frequently find or construct small realms sealed off from the rest of the world, where they could isolate themselves in the pursuit of ever-greater magical knowledge and power. The mages are long gone, but many of their arcane laboratories still exist, filled with the results of their experiments. Those willing to explore these laboratories may find powerful magical treasure, but be warned: the wizards to whom these labs belonged to deserved their reputations.}}

'''Wizard Laboratories''' (or '''Wizlabs''') are a collection of different [[portal]] levels, most of which are themed around and named after a particular wizard mentioned elsewhere in the game. Each contains a significant amount of loot, as well as unique challenges and enemies found nowhere else in the game. Only one wizard laboratory can generate per game, and not all games are guaranteed to have one. 

Wizlabs can be found in timed portals around [[the Depths]], [[the Vaults]], [[the Crypt]], and [[the Elven Halls]].

===List of Wizard Laboratories===
*[[File:Wizard_(monster).png]] '''[[Alistair's Party Mansion]]''' - The party of the century, featuring many a wizard.
*[[File:Halazid warlock.png]] '''[[Borgnjor's Mausoleum]]''' - A cemetery filled with the undead, who rise as [[lost soul]]s when killed.
*[[File:Cigotuvis monster.png]] '''[[Cigotuvi's Fleshworks]]''' - Twisting halls full of the results of twisted experiments. Only the fortunate will escape with their genes unscathed.
*[[File:Cloud Mage.png]] '''[[Cloud Mages' Chambers]]''' - Halls full of clouds and creatures of the winds. At the end waits a master [[Air Magic|Air Mage]].
*[[File:Royal mummy.png]] '''[[Doroklohe's Tomb]]''' - Many powerful entities lie quietly entombed here, but their tombs will not stay closed for long...
*[[File:Vine-covered_golem.png]] '''[[Eringya's Formal Garden]]''' - A plant haven, filled with ranged monsters tending to the garden.
*[[File:Hellbinder.png]] '''[[Hall of the Hellbinder]]''' - An evil temple filled with [[demon]]s and the cultists that traffic with them.
*[[File:Conjurer statue.png]] '''[[Iskenderun's Mystic Tower]]''' - Chock full of students of Iskenderun, all of whom are happy to practice their [[Conjurations]] on intruders.
*[[File:Moon troll.png]] '''[[Lehudib's Moon Base]]''' - A stronghold full of astral horrors, creatures of metal and stone, and the legendary Moon Troll.
*[[File:Iron golem.png]] '''[[Maxwell's Workshop]]''' - Filled with big, meaty workers who wield big, meaty maces -- and many of Maxwell's [[Maxwell's patent armour|dusty]] [[Maxwell's Thermic Engine|inventions]],
*[[File:Eldritch tentacle.png]] '''[[Roulette of Golubria]]''' - An extradimensional series of rooms linked by teleporters and filled with denizens of the [[Abyss]].
*[[File:Tukima's_machine.png]] '''[[Tukima's Studio]]''' - A danceroom filled with dancing weapons, walking tomes, and... you?
*[[File:Wucad mu statue.png]] '''[[Wucad Mu's Monastery]]''' - A timeless monastery patrolled by the shades of monks from ages past. The [[orange crystal statue]] in the center is the source of these apparitions.
*[[File:Head Instructor.png]] '''[[Yara's Duelist Academy]]'''- Featuring many students training in both magic and [[antimagic]], as well as the [[Head Instructor]] - a master wielding two antimagic [[triple sword]]s.
*[[File:Zonguldrok lich.png]] '''[[Zonguldrok's Shrine]]''' - A shrine guarded by the [[zombie|unquiet dead]] and [[skeletal warrior]]s. Zonguldrok himself will rise as a mighty [[lich]] to punish grave robbers.

==History==
* In [[0.28]], [[Tukima's Studio]] and [[Eringya's Formal Garden]] were re-introduced, and 4 new wizlabs were added: [[Yara's Duelist Academy]], [[Borgnjor's Mausoleum]], [[Maxwell's Workshop]], and [[Alistair's Party Mansion]].
* In [[0.17]], [[Lehudib's Moon Base]] was added, while Tukima's Studio and Eringya's Formal Garden were removed.
